mapper.insert: insert into person (user_name, user_age, user_password, user_account, user_salt, user_ban, user_activitycode, user_status) values (#{userName}, #{userAge}, #{userPassword}, #{userAccount}, #{userSalt}, #{userBan}, #{userActivityCode}, #{userStatus})
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*) / #{limit}) as totalPage from person
select user_account from person where user_account = #{userAcc}
select (user_name, user_account) from person where user_name = #{userName} or user_account = #{userAcc}
